items.content_html: Elementor Cache & Sync Helper is a lightweight WordPress plugin that adds a one-click admin bar button to clear Elementor cache and sync the library automatically. It streamlines workflow by triggering both actions 2 seconds apart, eliminating the need to navigate through Elementor‚Äôs settings manually.

items.content_html: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript‚Äîmaking it way harder for scrapers to detect.
